consolidatedProcessMxCnet.title: Consolidated Process
consolidatedProcessMxCnet.description: Consolidated Process in COMPRANET México. Identifies whether the contract is part of a consolidated purchase

procurementMethodMxCnet.title: Procurement Method
procurementMethodMxCnet.description: Procurement Method in COMPRANET México. Identifies the procurement method used by the buyer

procurementMethodCharacterMxCnet.title: Procurement character
procurementMethodCharacterMxCnet.description: Procurement character in COMPRANET México. Indicates the character of the procurement method used by the buyer

procurementMethodDetailsTemplateMxCnet.title: Procurement Method Details
procurementMethodDetailsTemplateMxCnet.description: Procurement Method Details in COMPRANET México. Indicates the template selected by the buyer's contact point while creating the contracting process and corresponds to the procurement method being used.

multiyearContractMxCnet.title: Multiyear Contract
multiyearContractMxCnet.description: Multiyear Contract in COMPRANET México. Indicates whether a contract spans more than one fiscal period

hasFramework.title: Contract Framework Existence
hasFramework.description: Indicates whether a Contract Framework is used in a specific contract. Contract Frameworks are a strategy through which buyers reach an agreement with one or many providers, where technical and quality specifications, scopes, prices and conditions are established to regulate the acquisition or leasing of properties, or the provision of services.

framework.title: Contract Framework
framework.description: Textual reference of the Contract Framework to which a specific contract is linked

multiyearContractMxCnet.title: Multiyear Contract
multiyearContractMxCnet.description: Multiyear Contract in COMPRANET México. Indicates whether a contract spans more than one fiscal period.

filedMxCnet.title: Filed contract
filedMxCnet.description: Filed contract in COMPRANET México. Classification state that indicates if the electronic element that contains the relevant contract data has been filed inside the system. This has no impact on publishing of the information being reported.

govLevel.title: Government Level
govLevel.description: The government level of the buyer party

scaleReportedByBuyerMxCnet.title: Scale Reported by Buyer
scaleReportedByBuyerMxCnet.description: Supplier party scale as reported by the buyer. Can be one of: No MIPYME, Mediana, Pequeña, or Micro.

scaleReportedBySupplierMxCnet.title: Scale Reported by Supplier
scaleReportedBySupplierMxCnet.description: Supplier party scale as reported by the supplier itself. Can be one of: No MIPYME, Mediana, Pequeña, or Micro.
